data.title: British Royals Family Tree
data.text:
For those interested in Genealogy here is a family tree of the descendants of Alfred the Great who lived 849 - 899, and from whom many of the royal families of Europe are descended. It shows 37 generations and over 3000 individuals including kings and queens of England, Scotland, Denmark, Spain, Portugal, Netherlands, Norway, Sweden, Belgium, Luxembourg, Russia, Hanover, Prussia, Bavaria, Romania, and Yugoslavia

Generation No. 1

1.ALFRED THE GREAT, KING OF WESSEX (871-899) was born 848 in Wantage, England, and died October 26, 899 in Winchester. He married EALHSWITH, daughter of EALDORMAN AETHELRED MUCEL. She died 905.

Children of ALFRED GREAT and EALHSWITH are:

i. LADY OF MERCIA AETHELFLAED, b. Abt. 870; d. June 12, 918, Tamworth; m. EALDORMAN AETHELRED OF MERCIA; d. 910.

More About LADY OF MERCIA AETHELFLAED: Burial: St Oswald's Priory, Gloucester

2. ii. EDWARD THE ELDER, b. Abt. 874; d. July 17, 924.

iii. ABBESS AETHELGIFU OF SHAFTESBURY, b. Abt. 875.

iv. AELFTHRYTH OF FLANDERS, b. Abt. 877; d. June 7, 929; m. COUNT BALDWIN II OF FLANDERS.

3. v. AETHELWEARD, b. Abt. 880; d. 920.

Generation No. 2

2. EDWARD THE ELDER, KING OF WESSEX (899-924) was born Abt. 874, and died July 17, 924. He married (1) EADGIFU (EDGIVA) OF KENT. He married (2) ECGWYN. He married (3) ELFLEDA (AELFFLAED).

More About EDWARD THE ELDER: Burial: Winchester

Children of EDWARD ELDER and EADGIFU are:

i. KING EDRED (946 - 955).

ii. EDBURH OF WINCHESTER.

iii. EDGIVA, m. KING OF PROVENCE LOUIS.

4. iv. EDMUND I THE ELDER, b. 922; d. 946.

Children of EDWARD ELDER and ECGWYN are:

v. DAUGHTER, m. KING OF DENMARK SIHTRIC OF NORTHUMBERLAND.

vi. KING AETHELSTAN (924 - 939), b. 895; d. 940. Burial: Malmesbury

Children of EDWARD ELDER and AELFFLAED are:

vii. AETHELWERD, d. 924.

viii. EDWIN.

ix. ELFLEDA.

x. EDGIFU, m. KING OF FRANCE CHARLES THE SIMPLE.

xi. ETHELHILDA.

xii. EDHILDA, m. COUNT OF PARIS HUGH THE GREAT.

xiii. EADGYTH (EDITH), m. KING OF GERMANY OTHO I THE GREAT.

xiv. ELGIVA, m. DUKE OF BOHEMIA BOLESLAW II.

3. AETHELWEARD was born Abt. 880, and died 920.

Children of AETHELWEARD are:

i. AELFWINE.

ii. AETHELWINE.

Generation No. 3

4. KING EDMUND I (939 - 946) was born 939, and died 946. He married (1) ST. ELGIVA. He married (2) ETHELFLEDA OF DOMERHAM, daughter of EALDORMAN ALFGAR OF WILTSHIRE.

More About EDMUND I THE ELDER: Burial: Glastonbury

Children of EDMUND and ELGIVA are:

i. KING EDWY (955 - 959), m. ELGIFU

5. ii. KING EDGAR THE PEACEFUL b. 944; d. 975.

Generation No. 4

5. KING EDGAR THE PEACEFUL (959-975) was born 944, and died 975. He married (1) ELFRIDA, daughter of ORDGAR OF DEVON EALDORMAN. She died 1000. He married (2) ETHELFLEDA, daughter of EALDORMAN ORDMAER.

More About EDGAR THE PEACEFUL: Burial: Glastonbury

Children of EDGAR and ELFRIDA are:

i. EDMUND, d. 970.

6. ii. KING ETHELRED II THE UNREADY, b. Abt. 968; d. 1016.

Child of EDGAR and ETHELFLEDA is:

iii.KING EDWARD THE MARTYR (975 - 978)

Generation No. 5

6. KING AETHELRED II THE UNREADY was born Abt. 968, and died 1016. He married (1) ELFREDA (ELFGIVA) Abt. 985, daughter of EALDORMAN THORED. He married (2) EMMA OF NORMANDY 1002, daughter of RICHARD and GUNNOR. She died 1052.

More About KING AETHELRED II THE UNREADY: Burial: St. Paul's

Children of AETHELRED and ELFREDA are:

7. i. EDMUND II IRONSIDE, d. 1016.

ii. ATHELSTAN.

iii. EGBERT, d. 1005.

iv. EDRED.

v. EDWY, d. 1017.

vi. EDWARD.

vii. EDGAR.

viii. EDITH, m. EALDORMAN EDRIC OF MERCIA STREONA.

ix. ELGIVA, m. UCHTRED.

x. WULFHILDA, m. EALDORMAN ULFCYTEL OF EAST ANGLIA SNYLLING.

xi. (DAUGHTER), m. ATHELSTAN.

Children of AETHELRED and EMMA are:

xii. ALFRED ATHLING, d. 1036.

xiii. KING OF ENGLAND EDWARD THE CONFESSOR, b. Abt. 1002, Islip, Oxfordshire, England; d. January 5, 1065/66; m. EDITH (EADGYTH), January 23, 1044/45; d. December 18, 1075. They had no children.

More About KING OF ENGLAND EDWARD THE CONFESSOR: Burial: January 6, 1065/66, Westminster, Abbey, London, England

More About EDITH (EADGYTH):

Burial: Westminster, Abbey, London, England. Her brother was HAROLD II, KING OF ENGLAND (1066) b. 1022, died in Battle of Hastings October 14, 1066. Harold married 1) Eadgyth Swan-neck and 2) Ealdgyth widow of Gruffydd ap Llywelyn.

More about EMMA OF NORMANDY. She married (2) CNUT (CANUTE), KING OF DENMARK (1014-1035) AND ENGLAND (1016-1035) b. 995, d. November 12, 1035 at Shaftesbury. He was buried at Winchester.

Great Nephew of EMMA was 8.1 WILLLIAM 1 THE CONQUEROR, DUKE OF NORMANDY AND KING OF ENGLAND (1066-1087) b. 1027 at Falaise in Normandy, d. September 9, 1087.

Children of CNUT and EMMA

i. HARTHACNUT, KING OF DENMARK (1035-1042) AND ENGLAND(1040-1042) b 1018, d. June 8, 1042 in London. buried in Winchester.

ii. GUNHILD.

Children of CNUT and ELFIGFU OF NORTHAMPTON9

i. SVEGN

ii. HAROLD I HAREFOOT, KING OF ENGLAND (1035-1040) b. 1017, d. March 17, 1040 at Oxford.

Generation No. 6

7. KING EDMUND II IRONSIDE(1016) born 990, died November 30, 1016 in London. He married EALDGYTH. He was buried at Glastonbury

Children of EDMUND and EALDGYTH are:

i. EDMUND 7, b. 990 m. HEDWIG

8. ii. EDWARD ATHLING, b. Abt. 1016; d. 1057.

Generation No. 7

8. EDWARD ATHLING was born Abt. 1016, and died 1057. He married AGATHA, daughter of KING OF HUNGARY STEPHEN I.

Children of EDWARD ATHLING and AGATHA are:

9. i. ST MARGARET, d. 1093.

ii. EDGAR ATHLING.

iii. CHRISTINA.

8.1. WILLLIAM I THE CONQUEROR, DUKE OF NORMANDY AND KING OF ENGLAND (1066-1087) illegitimate son of Robert I Duke of Normandy and Arlette daughter of Fulbert a tanner was born Sept 1028 in Falaise, Normandy, and died September 9, 1087 in Rouen, France from a riding accident. Buried in St Stephens Abbey, Caen, France. He married MATILDA OF FLANDERS in 1052 at Notre Dame d'Eu, Normandy, France. She was the daughter of Baldwin V of Flanders, was born abt 1031, died November 2, 1083 and buried in Holy Trininity Abbey, Caen, France.

More about MATILDA OF FLANDERS: She was the 5x great-grandaughter of ALFRED THE GREAT through his daughter Aelfthryth who married Baldwin II of Flanders.

More about WILLIAM OF NORMANDY: Great Nephew of EMMA OF NORMANDY mother of KING EDWARD THE CONFESSOR. WILLIAM became King of England by defeating KING HAROLD II at the Battle of Hastings in 1066.

Children of WILLIAM AND MATILDA are:

i. ROBERT II (CURTHOSE) Duke of Normandy b.1054 d. Feb 10, 1135

ii. RICHARD, DUKE OF BERNAY. b 1055 d. 1081

iii. CECILIA b. 1055 d. July 30, 1126

iv. KING WILLIAM II RUFUS(1087-1100) b. 1056 in Normandy, d. August 2, 1100 of arrow wound while riding in the New Forest. Buried in Winchester.

v. ADELICIA, d. 1065 became a nun

14 vi.ADELA, b. 1062, d. March 8, 1138 m Stephen Henry

vii. AGATHA, b. 1064, d. Aguust 13, 1090 m. Alan IV of Brittany

viiii. CONSTANCE, b. 1066, d. 1090

ix. MATLIDA, d. Before 1112

10. x. KING HENRY 1 (1100-1135) b. Sept 1068, d. Dec 1, 1135

Generation No. 8

9. ST MARGARET died 1093. She married KING OF SCOTLAND MALCOLM III CANMORE , son of DUNCAN and SYBIL. He died 1093.

Children of ST and MALCOLM are:

10. i. MATILDA (EDITH) OF SCOTLAND, b. Dunfermline; d. May 1, 1118, Westminster, Palace, London, England.

11. ii. MARY OF SCOTLAND.

iii. KING OF SCOTLAND EDGAR, b. Abt. 1074; d. 1107.

iv. KING OF SCOTLAND ALEXANDER I , b. 1078; d. 1124; m. SYBIL.

12. v. KING OF SCOTLAND DAVID I THE SAINT, b. Abt. 1080; d. 1153.

Generation No. 9

10. MATILDA (EDITH) OF SCOTLAND was born in Dunfermline, and died May 1, 1118 in Westminster, Palace, London, England. She married KING OF ENGLAND HENRY I August 6, 1100 in Westminster, Abbey, London, England, son of WILLIAM and MATILDA. He was born Abt. September 1068 in Selby, Yorkshire, England, and died December 1, 1135 in St Denis-le-, Fermont, Near Gisors.

More About MATILDA (EDITH) OF SCOTLAND: Burial: Westminster, Abbey, London, England

More About KING OF ENGLAND HENRY I BEAUCLERC: Burial: Reading Abbey

Children of MATILDA and HENRY are:

i. ROBERT OF GLOUCESTER, d. 1147.

13. ii. MATILDA, b. Winchester; d. September 10, 1167, Rouen.

iii. SYBIL, m. KING OF SCOTLAND ALEXANDER I ; b. 1078; d. 1124.

iv. RICHARD, d. 1120.

v. DUKE OF NORMANDY WILLIAM, b. Bef. August 5, 1103, Winchester; d. November 25, 1120; m. ISABELLA.

11. MARY OF SCOTLAND She married COUNT EUSTACE III OF BOULOGNE.

Children of MARY and EUSTACE are:

14. i. MATILDA OF BOULOGNE, b. Boulogne; d. May 3, 1152, Hedingham Castle, Essex, England.

12. KING OF SCOTLAND DAVID I THE SAINT was born Abt. 1080, and died 1153. He married MATILDA. She died 1131.

Children of DAVID and MATILDA are:

15. i. EARL HENRY OF HUNTINGDON, d. 1152.

Generation No. 10

13. MATILDA was born in Winchester, and died September 10, 1167 in Rouen. She married (1) HOLY ROMAN EMPR HENRY V January 7, 1113/14 in Mainz. He was born 1086, and died May 23, 1125 in Utrecht. She married (2) COUNT OF ANJOU GEOFFREY V PLANTAGENET May 22, 1127 in Le Mans. He died September 7, 1151 in Chateau-du-Loir.

Children of MATILDA and GEOFFREY PLANTAGENET are:

16. i. KING OF ENGLAND HENRY II, b. March 5, 1132/33, Le Mans; d. July 6, 1189, Chinon.

ii. COUNT OF NANTES GEOFFREY VI OF ANJOU, b. 1134; d. 1158.

iii. COUNT OF POITOU WILLIAM, b. 1136; d. 1164.

14. MATILDA OF BOULOGNE was born in Boulogne, and died May 3, 1152 in Hedingham Castle, Essex, England. She married

KING OF ENGLAND STEPHEN 1125 in Westminster, England, son of STEPHEN and ADELA. He was born Abt. 1096 in Blois, France, and died October 25, 1154 in Dover Castle.

More About MATILDA OF BOULOGNE: Burial: Faversham Abbey

More About KING OF ENGLAND STEPHEN: Burial: Faversham Abbey

Children of MATILDA and STEPHEN are:

i. COUNT EUSTACE OF BOULONGNE, d. August 10, 1153, Bury St Edmunds; m. CONSTANCE OF TOULOUSE, Aft. February 1139/40.

ii. BALDWIN, b. Abt. 1126; d. Bef. December 2, 1135, London, England.

iii. MATILDA, b. Abt. 1133; d. Abt. 1135.

iv. COUNT WILLIAM OF BOULOGNE, b. Abt. 1134; d. October 11, 1159, Toulouse; m. ISABEL DE WARRENNE, Abt. 1149.

v. COUNTESS MARY OF BOULOGNE, b. Abt. 1136; d. 1182, St Austrebert; m. COUNT BOULOGNE MATTHEW OF ALSACE, Abt. 1160.

15. EARL HENRY OF HUNTINGDON died 1152. He married ADA.

Children of HENRY and ADA are:

17. i. EARL DAVID OF HUNTINGDON, d. 1219.

ii. ii. KING OF SCOTLAND MALCOLM IV

18. iii. KING OF SCOTLAND WILLIAM I THE LION

Generation No. 11

16. KING OF ENGLAND HENRY II was born March 5, 1132/33 in Le Mans, and died July 6, 1189 in Chinon. He married DUCHESS ELEANOR OF AQUITAINE May 18, 1152 in Bordeaux, France, daughter of DUKE WILLIAM X OF AQUITAINE, following her divorce from Louis VII of France. She was born Abt. 1122 in Bordeaux/Berlin, and died April 1, 1204 in Fontevraud.

More About KING OF ENGLAND HENRY II: Burial: Fontevraud Abbey

More About ELEANOR OF AQUITAINE: Burial: Fontevraud

Children of HENRY and ELEANOR are:

i. WILLIAM, b. August 17, 1152, Normandy, England; d. Abt. April 1156, Wallingford, Castle, Berkshire, England.

ii. KING OF ENGLAND HENRY THE YOUNG KING, b. February 28, 1154/55, Bermondsey; d. June 11, 1183, Martel; m. MARGARET OF FRANCE; d. 1198.

iii. MATILDA (MAUD), b. 1156, London, England; d. June 28, 1189, Brunswick; m. DUKE OF SAXONY HENRY THE LION, February 1, 1167/68, Minden, Saxony, Germany; d. 1195.

iv. KING OF ENGLAND RICHARD I COEUR DE LION, b. 1157, Beaumont Palace, Oxford, England; d. April 6, 1199, Chalus, Limousin; m. BERENGARIA OF NAVARRE; b. 1163; d. 1230.

More About KING OF ENGLAND RICHARD I COEUR DE LION: Burial: Fontevraud Abbey

19. v. DUKE OF BRITTANY GEOFFREY, b. September 23, 1158; d. August 19, 1186, Paris.

20. vi. ELEANOR, b. October 13, 1162, Domfront, Normandy; d. October 31, 1214, Burgos.

vii. JOAN PLANTAGENET, b. October 1165, Angers; d. September 4, 1199; m. (1) KING OF SICILY WILLIAM II THE GOOD, February 13, 1176/77, Palermo, Italy; b. 1166; d. November 18, 1189; m. (2) COUNT RAYMOND VI OF TOULOUSE, October 1196, Rouen.

21. viii. KING OF ENGLAND JOHN LACKLAND, b. December 24, 1167, Beaumont Palace, Oxford, England; d. October 19, 1216, Newark Castle, Newark, Nottinghamshire, England.

17. EARL DAVID OF HUNTINGDON died 1219. He married MATILDA, daughter of EARL OF CHESTER HUGH KEVELIOCK. She died 1233.

Children of DAVID and MATILDA are:

22. i. ISOBEL, d. 1251.

23. ii. MARGARET, d. 1228.

18. KING OF SCOTLAND WILLIAM I THE LION He married ERMENGARDE. She died 1234.

Child of WILLIAM and ERMENGARDE is:

24. i. KING OF SCOTLAND ALEXANDER II, b. 1198; d. 1249.

Generation No. 12

19. DUKE OF BRITTANY GEOFFREY was born September 23, 1158, and died August 19, 1186 in Paris. He married DUCHESS CONSTANCE OF BRITTANY July 1181, daughter of DUKE CONAN OF BRITTANY. She died 1201.

Children of GEOFFREY and CONSTANCE are:

i. ELEANOR, d. 1241.

ii. ARTHUR, b. 1187; d. 1203.

20. ELEANOR was born October 13, 1162 in Domfront, Normandy, and died October 31, 1214 in Burgos. She married KING OF CASTILE ALFONSO VIII September 1170 in Burgos, son of KING OF CASTILE SANCHO III. He was born 1155, and died 1214.

Child of ELEANOR and ALFONSO is:

25. i. BERENGARIA, b. 1171; d. 1246.

21. KING OF ENGLAND JOHN LACKLAND was born December 24, 1167 in Beaumont Palace, Oxford, England, and died October 19, 1216 in Newark Castle, Newark, Nottinghamshire, England. He married (1) COUNTESS ISABELLA DE CLARE OF GLOUCESTER August 29, 1189 in Marlebridge, daughter of EARL WILLIAM OF GLOUCESTER. She died November 1217. He married (2) ISABELLA OF ANGOULEME August 24, 1200 in Bordeaux, daughter of AYMER TAILLEFER and ALICE. She was born Abt. 1188 in Angouleme, and died May 31, 1246 in Fontevraud.

More About KING OF ENGLAND JOHN LACKLAND: Burial: Worcester, Cathedral

More About ISABELLA OF ANGOULEME: Burial: Fontevraud Abbey

Children of JOHN and ISABELLA are:

26. i. KING OF ENGLAND HENRY III, b. October 1, 1207, Winchester, Castle; d. November 16, 1272, Westminster, Palace, London, England.

27. ii. EARL OF CORNWALL RICHARD, b. January 5, 1208/09, Winchester, Castle, England; d. 1272, Newark Castle, Newark, England.

iii. JOAN, b. July 22, 1210, Gloucester, England; d. March 4, 1237/38, Near London, England; m. KING OF SCOTLAND ALEXANDER II; b. 1198; d. 1249.

iv. ISABELLA, b. 1214, Gloucester; d. December 1, 1241, Foggia; m. EMPEROR FREDERICK II OF GERMANY, July 20, Worms.

28. v. ELEANOR, b. 1215, Gloucester; d. April 13, 1275, Montargis, France.

22. ISOBEL died 1251. She married LORD ROBERT OF ANNANDALE BRUCE.

Child of ISOBEL and ROBERT BRUCE is:

29. i. ROBERT BRUCE, d. 1295.

23. MARGARET died 1228. She married LORD OF GALLOWAY ALAN.

Child of MARGARET and ALAN is:

30. i. DEVORGUILLA, d. 1290.

24. KING OF SCOTLAND ALEXANDER II was born 1198, and died 1249. He married (1) JOAN, daughter of JOHN and ISABELLA. She was born July 22, 1210 in Gloucester, England, and died March 4, 1237/38 in Near London, England. He married (2) MARY OF COUCY Aft. 1238.

Child of ALEXANDER and MARY is:

31. i. KING OF SCOTLAND ALEXANDER III, b. 1241; d. 1286.

Generation No. 13

25. BERENGARIA was born 1171, and died 1246. She married KING OF CASTILE ALFONSO IX 1197. He died 1230.

Child of BERENGARIA and ALFONSO is:

32. i. KING OF CASTILE FERDINAND III, b. 1199; d. 1252.

26. KING OF ENGLAND HENRY III was born October 1, 1207 in Winchester, Castle, and died November 16, 1272 in Westminster, Palace, London, England. He married ELEANOR OF PROVENCE January 4, 1235/36 in Canterbury, Cathedral, daughter of COUNT RAYMOND OF PROVENCE. She was born Abt. 1217 in Aix-en-Provence, and died June 24, 1291 in Amesbury, Wiltshire.

More About KING OF ENGLAND HENRY III: Burial: Westminster, Abbey, London, England

More About ELEANOR OF PROVENCE: Burial: Convent Church, Amesbury

Children of HENRY and ELEANOR are:

33. i. KING OF ENGLAND EDWARD I (LONGSHANKS), b. June 17, 1239, Westminster, Palace, London, England; d. July 7, 1307, Near Carlisle.

34. ii. MARGARET, b. September 29, 1240, Windsor Castle, Berkshire, England; d. February 26, 1274/75, Cupar Castle, Fife.

iii. BEATRICE, b. June 25, 1242, Bordeaux; d. March 24, 1274/75, London, England; m. EARL OF RICHMOND JOHN OF DREUX, January 22, 1259/60, St Denis.

35. iv. EARL EDMUND CROUCHBACK OF LEICESTER, b. January 16, 1244/45, London, England; d. June 5, 1296, Bayonne.

v. RICHARD, b. Abt. 1247; d. Bef. 1256.

vi. JOHN, b. Abt. 1250; d. Bef. 1256.

vii. KATHERINE, b. November 25, 1253, Westminster; d. May 3, 1257, Windsor Castle, Berkshire, England.

viii. WILLIAM, b. Abt. 1256; d. Abt. 1256.

ix. HENRY, b. Aft. 1256; d. Abt. 1257.

27. EARL OF CORNWALL RICHARD was born January 5, 1208/09 in Winchester, Castle, England, and died 1272 in Newark Castle, Newark, England. He married (1) LADY ISABELLA MARSHAL March 13, 1230/31 in Fawley, Bucks, daughter of EARL WILLIAM OF PEMBROKE MARSHAL. She was born October 9, 1200 in Pembroke Castle, and died January 15, 1239/40 in Berkhamsted. He married (2) SANCHIA OF PROVENCE November 23, 1243 in Westminster, Abbey, London, England, daughter of COUNT RAYMOND OF PROVENCE BERENGAR. She was born Abt. 1225 in Aix-en-Provence, and died November 9, 1261 in Berkhamsted. He married (3) BEATRIX OF FALKENBURG June 16, 1269 in Kaiserslautern, Germany, daughter of COUNT WILLIAM DE FAUQUEMONT OF MONTJOYE. She was born Abt. 1253, and died October 17, 1277.

More About EARL OF CORNWALL RICHARD: Burial: Worcester, Cathedral

Child of RICHARD and ISABELLA MARSHAL is:

i. HENRY, d. 1271.

Children of RICHARD and SANCHIA are:

ii. EARL OF CORNWALL EDMUND, d. 1300; m. MARGARET.

iii. RICHARD, d. 1296.

28. ELEANOR was born 1215 in Gloucester, and died April 13, 1275 in Montargis, France. She married (1) EARL OF PEMBROKE WILLIAM MARSHAL April 23, 1224. He died April 24, 1231. She married (2) EARL LEICESTER SIMON DE MONTFORT January 7, 1238/39 in Westminster. He died August 4, 1265 in Evesham.

Child of ELEANOR and SIMON DE MONTFORT is:

i. 5SONS 1DAU.

29. ROBERT BRUCE died 1295. He married ISOBEL, daughter of EARL GILBERT DE CLARE OF GLOUCESTER. She died 1254.

Child of ROBERT BRUCE and ISOBEL is:

36. i. ROBERT BRUCE, d. 1304.

30. DEVORGUILLA died 1290. She married JOHN BALLIOL.

Child of DEVORGUILLA and JOHN BALLIOL is:

37. i. KING OF SCOTLAND JOHN BALLIOL, d. 1313.

31. KING OF SCOTLAND ALEXANDER III was born 1241, and died 1286. He married (1) YOLANDE, daughter of COUNT OF DREUX ROBERT IV. He married (2) MARGARET December 26, 1251 in York, daughter of HENRY and ELEANOR. She was born September 29, 1240 in Windsor Castle, Berkshire, England, and died February 26, 1274/75 in Cupar Castle, Fife.

Child of ALEXANDER and MARGARET is:

38. i. MARGARET, d. 1283.

Generation No. 14

32. KING OF CASTILE FERDINAND III was born 1199, and died 1252.

Children of KING OF CASTILE FERDINAND III are:

39. i. KING OF CASTILE ALFONSO X THE WISE, b. Abt. 1226; d. 1284, Seville, Spain.

40. ii. ELEANOR OF CASTILE, b. 1241, Castile, Spain; d. November 28, 1290, Harby, Nr Newark, Notts.

33. KING OF ENGLAND EDWARD I (LONGSHANKS) was born June 17, 1239 in Westminster, Palace, London, England, and died July 7, 1307 in Near Carlisle. He married (1) ELEANOR OF CASTILE October 1254 in Las Huelgas, daughter of KING OF CASTILE FERDINAND III. She was born 1241 in Castile, Spain, and died November 28, 1290 in Harby, Nr Newark, Notts. He married (2) MARGUERITE OF FRANCE September 10, 1299 in Canterbury, Cathedral, daughter of PHILIP and MARY. She was born 1279 in Paris, and died February 14, 1316/17 in Marlborough, Castle.

More About KING OF ENGLAND EDWARD I (LONGSHANKS): Burial: October 27, 1307, Westminster, Abbey, London, England

More About ELEANOR OF CASTILE: Burial: December 17, 1290, Westminster, Abbey, London, England

More About MARGUERITE OF FRANCE: Burial: Grey Friars, Church, London, England

Children of EDWARD and ELEANOR are:

i. ELEANOR, b. June 17, 1264, Windsor Castle, Berkshire, England; d. October 12, 1297, Ghent.

ii. JOAN, b. 1265; d. 1265.

iii. JOHN, b. July 10, 1266, Windsor, Berkshire, England; d. August 3, 1271, Westminster, London, England.

iv. HENRY, b. July 13, 1267, Windsor, Berkshire, England; d. October 14, 1274, Merton, Surrey.

v. JULIAN (KATHERINE), b. 1271, Holy Land; d. 1271, Holy Land.

vi. JOAN OF ACRE, b. 1272, Acre, Palestine; d. April 23, 1307, Clare, Suffolk, England; m. (1) EARL GLOUCESTER GILBERT DE CLARE, April 30, 1290, Westminster, Abbey, London, England; d. 1295; m. (2) BARON RALPH DE MONTHERMER, January 1296/97; d. 1305.

vii. EARL OF CHESTER ALFONSO, b. November 24, 1273, Bordeaux; d. August 19, 1284, Windsor Castle, Berkshire, England.

viii. MARGARET, b. September 11, 1275, Windsor Castle, Berkshire, England; d. 1318, Brussels; m. DUKE OF BRABANT JOHN II, July 8, 1290, Westminster, Abbey, London, England.

ix. BERENGARIA, b. 1276, Kennington; d. Abt. 1279.
